Sentencas: The lattice Boltzmann method (LBM) was used to study the three-dimensional (3D) mass diffusion of three species (H-2, H2O, and N-2) in the pore phase of a porous solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) anode.
Titulo: Lattice Boltzmann Modeling of Three-Dimensional, Multicomponent Mass Diffusion in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: The method used is an extension of a two-dimensional (2D) LBM model (2007, Lattice Boltzmann Method for Continuum, Multi-Component Mass Diffusion in Complex 2D Geometries, J. Phys.
Titulo: Lattice Boltzmann Modeling of Three-Dimensional, Multicomponent Mass Diffusion in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode
Lattice Boltzmann Modeling of Three-Dimensional, Multicomponent Mass Diffusion in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: 2961-2971) to study mass transport in SOFC anodes (2007,  Lattice Boltzmann Modeling of 2D Gas Transport in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode, J. Power Sources, 164, pp.
Titulo: Lattice Boltzmann Modeling of Three-Dimensional, Multicomponent Mass Diffusion in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode
Lattice Boltzmann Modeling of Three-Dimensional, Multicomponent Mass Diffusion in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: The 3D porous anode geometry is initially modeled using a set of randomly packed and overlapping solid spheres.
Titulo: Lattice Boltzmann Modeling of Three-Dimensional, Multicomponent Mass Diffusion in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: Results using this simple geometry model are then compared with results for an actual SOFC anode geometry obtained using X-ray computed tomography (XCT) at sub-50 nm resolution.
Titulo: Lattice Boltzmann Modeling of Three-Dimensional, Multicomponent Mass Diffusion in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: The effective diffusivity D-eff of the porous anode is a parameter, which is widely used in system-level models.
Titulo: Lattice Boltzmann Modeling of Three-Dimensional, Multicomponent Mass Diffusion in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: However, empirical relationships often used to calculate this value may not be accurate for the porous geometry that is actually used.
Titulo: Lattice Boltzmann Modeling of Three-Dimensional, Multicomponent Mass Diffusion in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: Solution of the 3D Laplace equation provides a more reliable and accurate means to estimate the effective diffusivity for a given anode geometry.
Titulo: Lattice Boltzmann Modeling of Three-Dimensional, Multicomponent Mass Diffusion in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: The effective diffusivity is calculated for different geometries and for a range of porosity values, both for the 3D sphere packing model and for the real geometry obtained by XCT.
Titulo: Lattice Boltzmann Modeling of Three-Dimensional, Multicomponent Mass Diffusion in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: The LBM model is then used to predict species mole fractions within the spherical packing model geometry and the XCT geometry.
Titulo: Lattice Boltzmann Modeling of Three-Dimensional, Multicomponent Mass Diffusion in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: The mole fraction variation is subsequently used to calculate the concentration polarization.
Titulo: Lattice Boltzmann Modeling of Three-Dimensional, Multicomponent Mass Diffusion in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: These predictions compare well with previously obtained 2D results and with results reported in the literature.
Titulo: Lattice Boltzmann Modeling of Three-Dimensional, Multicomponent Mass Diffusion in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: The 3D mass transport model developed in this work can be eventually coupled with other transport models and be used to optimize the anode microstructure geometry.
Titulo: Lattice Boltzmann Modeling of Three-Dimensional, Multicomponent Mass Diffusion in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode
Lattice Boltzmann Modeling of Three-Dimensional, Multicomponent Mass Diffusion in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode
